choices: Open Your Eyes
Keep them Shut
Try to Tip over the chair with your eyes closed
1.content: You are in a pitch black room, gentle murmuring and the occasional happy cheer breaks the peace, slowly you come to be aware that you are surrounded by kids of all ages, you try to move but find yourself bound tightly to a cheap metal chair. Your eyes dart around, wondering what the hell happened when you visited the ticket office for your favorite sports team. Wherever you are it's broiling, a dull droneing sound begins to stirr in your ears, the children seem very restless and they begin to scream, you can't make out what, but a deep instinctive fear makes you writh in your chair, Suddenly the music becomes audible over the crowd. No.. Not that. Not that horrible music. You try to cover your ears but remember they are bound tightly. closing your eyes for a moment you try to blot out the "Barney" theme. Some horrible person thought this was a vindictive practical joke? who. You hear a enourmous thumping sound, shaking the room as the mob of chilldren finally make a collective awe.
1.title: Waking Up

choices: Stare at the Statue
Attempt to knock over your chair somehow and escape the bonds
11.content: You open your eyes and look at where the spotlights are, your mouth drops open, a very shoddy looking replica of the monster is on stage, it's purple paint job hardly worth a cent, bright yellow splotches and run stains cover the beast, the size though, that they did right, it seems to stand roughly 5o feet tall. it's muzzle is also far more pointed, much more like a real Rex would look.
11.title: Seeing the world

choices: Watch
Try to Knock over your chair and escape
111.content: You stare slackjaws as the statue like Barney shuffles in place, The creature gives a deafening roar, your hearing will certainly suffer for a long time. as you look back you see the rex stare back at you, all the children are beginning a slow chant "Barney" The huge Rex's tail thrashes behind it, shredding a curtain that wraps around the middle of the tail. This is a heck of a machine you think. it's small forearms moving , then it bend down fully to grasp a microphone, it looks exceedingly clumsy at this and you almost laugh as it struggles, this might not be all bad, finnally the monster grabs the microphone and slowly straightens itself out. looking back at the audience it seems nearly as surprised as you.
111.title: The Monster

choices: Let The song sink in.
1111.content:
The beast sings, it has a horrible voice, this barney production really sucks, that almost makes it managable, the voice is deep and thunderous, yet unsure, as if this is something entierly new, not much like a recording. the sound has a very different sound to it this time though.I LOVE YOU, YOU LOVE ME

I AM GOING TO EAT YOU MESSILY

YOU LAY THEIR, WITH YOUR BELLIES UP

AND I WILL SWALLOW YOU IN ONE BIG GULP (swallows, large adams apple slowly descends)

IN YOU GO( pats mouth)

OUT YOU COME (MOONS AND PATS POSTERIOR)

HERE YOU STAY(RUBS PAUNCH)

UNTIL YOU ARE GONE

LEAP IN HERE(OPENS MOUTH WIDE)

TO END YOUR LIFE QUICK, AND STAY IN HERE (PATS BELLY)

FOR A ETERNITY OF DIGESTION

DO NOT RUN, OR TRY TO FLEE

I WILL CATCH YOU ANYWAY, AND I WILL SIT ON YOU

THEN PEAL YOU OFF MY RUMP

AND CHEW LOTS, BEFORE I SWALLOW YOU!

NOW MY SONG HAS REACHED AN END

AND YOU TOO WILL BE IN ME MY FRIEND

YOU CANT ESCAPE ME

OR MY BELLY CONSTRAINING GRIP

AND YOU WILL BECOME

ONLY FARTS, BELCHES, AND BELLY FAT

IT'S MEAL TIME!
1111.title: Singing Rexes?

choices: Untie the bonds on your feet
Grab the Child next to you and wave them in the air
11111.content: You swallow once as you twist and turn violently in you chair, if this is what Barney says it explains and awful lot, but that monster looks too dangerous to take chances, squriming finnaly pays off your sweat allows you to slip your hands from the bonds, you look at the children around you as the house lights come up, they are still mesmorized by the mosnters song. You watch as the beast's fearsome jaws open wide and it's dripping wet tongue curls out and licks it's lips the monster rex takes two steps foward, each one shuddering the auditorium, the beast swings it's head as some children jump up and lean back apparently trying to follow the comands, others just look around confusedly, but most of them just stare as the Rex's paint coat looks more and more flimsy, the tail swishs again behind and tears down a higher curtain, squinting your eyes you can almost make out a normal barney sized suits head lying on the floor. The huge beast quickly gains your attention again as it lifts it's foot high and smashes it into the ground, sending everything into the air. you land back in your seat, as most others.
11111.title: Time to think up a plan

choices: Continue to look at the rex
Start Climbing over other people to get away
111111.content: You quickly untie the bonds on your feet, watching the rex as it stomps into the crowd, the moment your feet are free you see one of the huge clawed feed land on a front row child, a sickening sliding crunching sound, the beasts head quickly turns, careless of the child it steped on, a few people are fidgeting, but no one seems to have the sense to run. You kick your feet free and look at the rex one more time, and it looks at you, in a staring trance you remain motionless.(
111111.title: Getting Free

choices: Duck Down to Avoid the Glance
(See other two choices)
1111111.content: As you stare at the huge rex it swings it's head, looking away from you, you exhale softly, apparently it did not find you interestesting enough, or maybe it isn't good with motion. You watch as it begins to step off after a huge crowd of people clamor over eachother in a vain attempt to escape, it lunges, catching a few children in it's jaws, quickly lifting it's head and swallowing in one motion, it's huge belly wobbles a little from the new mass inside it, , it moves a little too much, some children must have survived the beasts bite and are moving around inside the belly. You gulp, transfixed. he see that the head of the rex begins to swivil toward you
1111111.title: It's big, ugle and hungry

choices: Twist around And grab the tongue
(Other two choices
11111111.content: You duck down, falling back into a sea of chairs and cause a huge clatter, you quickly scramble into the sea of chairs and people, diving through like a swimmer you find the going surprisingly easy, suddenly you feel somelthing wet slurp around your foot, you instinctivly kick with your other, making contact and getting whatever was tasting you off, you continue to squirm through whatever you can, but you get stuck, you arm is wedged in a chair, that is pinned by a rather fat childs body killed in the panic. you fight to get it free as you feel the same wetness encoil your foot again, this time your kick doesn't work and you are lifted free of mess of chairs and high into the air. You spin around and see the huge rex staring at you, it's tongue twisted around your foot and fling lifting you over it's wide opened jaws, you can
11111111.title: Duck Down

choices: Grab onto the ribbed upper palet with your fingers
Catch your breath and try to think of something else
111111111.content: You grab the tongue tip with your whole body, feeling the slick wetness slurp around you, the tongue stretches and twirls, twisting around you as you hug it, almost like a wet constricter. You get soaked with more saliva as you wrestle it as best you can, you are finally pressed up against the hard roof of the mouth, you lose your breath and begin to move back toward the throat do you?
111111111.title: Mouthed

choices: It is so curoius that it spares you... but for what purpose?
Its not impressed and sits on you.
1111111111.content:
You reach up and cling to the upper palate. You are now hanging from the rexs move, with a slimy tongue gliding between your legs.

The movement of the slippery muscle starts to get arousing, and just when your about to fall, the rex stops trying to swallow you.

It seems your arousal has saved you... for the moment.

The rex is utterly confused. Whatever could be arousing when he was trying to eat you?

You feel yourself spat out, and land on your back, staring into the eys of the rex.

It bends down, and sniffs at your crotch. Then with a grunt it snags its teeth on your trousers and rips them off.
1111111111.title: Savour for Lust!

choices: Keep kicking with your other foot
grab a chair as you are lifted and toss it at the Rex's head
111111112.title: Choics Choices

choices: Look back
continue to struggle forward to the tip of the tongue
1111111121.content: You scream at the top of your lungs, spinning in place you plant your free foot onto the lifting tongue, hitting hard and splattering saliva everywhere, it jecks away, yanking you with it in a snaping motion, stunned slightly you come to your senses to find the tip of the tongue coiling around your stomach, squeezing you hard, almost in a serpentine way. You gasp for air as you are reeled into the rexes huge jaws, The jaws close behind you with a defining chomp as you are hurled back against the top of the mouth, you land in a daze near the throats entrance, you scream again and begin to scramble back up the tongue do you
1111111121.title: Kicking jaws

choices: In the Jaws
Instant Swallow
1111111122.content: You scream at the top of your lungs as you make contact with the chair you were lunging for, in one motion you twist up against the tongue and heave the metal chair with all your might at the rexes drooling jaws The chair sails at the jaws as they open, it bounces onto the tongue, three more weakening bounces and it vanishes from view, Ok Einstein, that did a lot to improve your position eh? You gulp as the tongue yanks you through the air and into the jaws, you gasp as the toothy jaws close behind you, giving you a very bad haircut.
1111111122.title: Chair througing

choices: You Remain motionless
You take a chair and charge the Rex, hoping to shake everyone out of there daze
11111112.title: Hungry rex

choices: What?
111111122.content: You take a chair and charge forward, frustrated to the extreme you know it's probably suicide but you lunge forward, swinging the flimsy metal chair with all your might, you leap over a body and slam the chair into the monsters snout and run through it's legs, Dashing off to the right you notice your not dead, you slid down under a large table and peek out, the dinosaur is shaking it's head a little, looking quiet stuned, your chair wrapped around one eye and it's bony brow, at least the dino will have trouble seeing now you think. You notice those big nostrils sniffing though. you might have won a round, but whats next. You shiver a moment in fear and decide that you had better get help
111111122.title: Charge of the Idiot Briggade

1111111221.content: You dash to the door and open it, diving through a second before huge jaws clamp behind you, you are in the normal passageways, far to small for the rex to get through, you run, spured on by adreniline into the street, screaming at the top of your lungs, running into the park. Quickly a patrolling policeman takes you down, quickly you calm down and explain what is happening. The cop smiles friendly "Your a Drunk, but your not driving, now let me get you some coffee and we can talk down at the station" No matter what you said no one believed you until early next morning when the destruction had been found, not a trace of any bodies, but footprints of the rex remained very well defined. You could think of the thought of all those screaming brats nicely backed away in that huge belly, you survived, and. it was a lot more exciting than you thought barney could ever be. Maybe you could lure that big rex back for another performance someday. (The End)
1111111221.title: Survival.

choices: grab and hug the tongue
Kick with your other foot(
1111112.content: As you franticly try to climb over people you hear more thuding footsteps coming closer as you scamble over a few more people, suddenly you feel something hot and wet wrap around your foot, coiling it around like a serpent. you are lifted off the mob and twist around to see the wide opened jaws of the rex, it's tongue dangling you above it, looking down into the powerful jaws, dripping with great gobs of sickly saliva, the humid smell from the jaws is beyond belief and almost makes you want to lose your lunch into the jaws.
1111112.title: Over them, in plain site

choices: grab the tongue with your arms and hug it tightly in hopes the rex might gag
Stop kicking and grab at something with your hands
111112.content: You lurch over and grab a child, the screaming kid puts up a hell of a fight but you hold him over your head, your eyes look up, you got the Rex's attention, you wanted that right? Well the rex takes a few long steps crushing anyone in it's path as it reaches you , in one quick motion the jaws flip open and come bolting down on you and your waving kid, you both scream as you are lifted into the air, you feel long teeth pierce your back as your legs flail outside, your grip on the child lossens as the beast lifts his head, the kid goes sliding down the tongue and moments later vanishes into the dark tunnel that must be the rexes throat. you suddenly feel the wet slurping tongue on your belly, drenching your clothing as it wiggles underneath you, you scream again and kick your feet, feeling a shoe slip of one foot you stop a moment do you
111112.title: Chivalry is dead

choices: The rex belches
1111121.content: You grab the big rexes tongue with your arms, hoping to make the beast gag. No success however. The tongue pushes you towards the back of the throat. You hang on for your life as you look down at the hungry throat. Lady luck must have been on your side though because strange noises comes from the rexes throat and...
1111121.title: In the jaws of the beast

choices: The beast jumps in front of you
11111211.content:
The rex releases a large belch. The pressure from the belch blows you out of the mouth. You land on the floor with a thud. You run for the nearest exit. You hear the rex singing another verse:

HEY! WAIT A SEC

YOU HAD BETTER COME RIGHT BACK

I'LL TEACH YOU NOT TO RUN FROM ME

YOU WILL BE SO SORRY

You wonder what the beast meant by that, but you didn't have long to find out cause...
11111211.title: Sorry!

choices: Opens its mouth wide
Turns around and sits on you
111112111.content: You stumble as the beast lands right in front of you. you wonder what its going to do to you. Suddenly the big rex....
111112111.title: Your punishment

1111121111.content: The barney rex looking thing opens its mouth wide and scoops you up. The beast doesn't even bother to chew as you feel the tongue push you towards the throat. You feel the dino tilt its head back and gulp you down as you slide into the wet gullet. You slide down the throat, struggling all the way, you soon give up, figuring its pointless and you're pretty much dino food now. You squeeze into the stomach and land in acid. You feel your body start to burn as the acid works on your skin. You start getting dizzy and soon fall asleep for the last time as the stomach around you starts churning your body. Hopefully you'll become part of this beast and not just one of his smelly farts.
1111121111.title: In the belly of the beast

choices: Staring right at you
Sleeping soundly in the corner of the room
1111121112.content:
You expect the rex to eat you bet instead it turns around and sits on you. You feel pressure as the beasts rump slowly crushes you. You look for a plan of escape and see it above you. The rex's tailhole. You can't believe you're doing this but its better then being crushed under this ass. You stick your arms out and push them through the hole. you then stuff in your head, the smell is unbearable. The rex lets out a loud fart. You almost choke. Soon your waist high in the big rex's tailhole. The rest of the way is easy as you are pushed the rest of the way in as the beast sits down. The pucker behind you closes, trapping you in the ass. You hear screams of children panicking, and the sound of the rex chewing. Oh well, at least you're safe in here for the moment. The smell is so unbearable you can hardly breathe. You soon pass out and fall asleep.


Later... You wake up as you feel something soft and moist push you out the tailhole opening. You fall to the ground in a pile of the rex's shit. You peek your head out to find the rex...
1111121112.title: Welcome to my bowels human

11111211121.content: The rex stares right at you. You remain motionless. The rex exhales deeply. You cough at the smell. The rex then opens his mouth wide and scoops you in, shit and all. The beast then starts chewing. You feel a stabbing pain in your chest as one of the sharp teeth stabs your chest. You breathing shallows then stops completed. You die as you are chewed to a pulp and swallowed.
11111211121.title: Defeat by the teeth

11111211122.content: You see the rex sleeping in a corner of the auditorium. you climb out of the dung and walk towards the exit quietly. You look around at the room. no one in sight. The rex must have eaten everyone else. You reach the door when you hear a whimper. You look around and see a little girl cowering under a chair. You don't know how, but apperently she survived the wrath of the large rex. You take her hand and pull her out. You tell her to be quiet as you open the door. As you reach the door outside, you feel so relieved that you survived. The auditorium door is too small for the rex to fit through. The little girl lets out a sigh as well. You see that she's probably around 8 years old. The two of you reach the outside and skip with joy. You ask for the girls name. She says her name is Natalie and she says she was invited to this party by her friends and had no idea there was going to be a man-eating monster. All you know is that you and Natalie are the only survivors of this nightmare.
11111211122.title: Lone survivors

choices: Under the tongue (rex doesnt know your there)
Out of the rexs move (does know your there.)
1111122.content:
You wildly grab onto one of the enormous teeth. The tongue withdraws and you are left hanging there as the rex roars in annoyance, think you have fallen out of its mouth.

The sudden roar makes you lose your grip, and you fall...
1111122.title: Hanging by the skin of his teeth.

choices: He knows you're there!
He doesn't know you're there and he opens his mouth.
11111221.content: You lose your grip, falling straight into the monster's mouth, right under his toungue. You hear yelling and destruction for a minute when all of a sudden you look up to see the Barney-like rex open it's mouth wide. At first you see feet than thighs than a torso and then.....the kid is dropped, straight down into the belly of the beast. You realize that next time he opens his mouth, it might be your opportunity to escape....
11111221.title: How fortunate!

choices: Think Think Think,
1112.content:
Bang, your backs on the ground still in your chair You wirth a moment on the ground, managing to slip one hand from the bounds, as you are about to continue to escape a thunderous voice blasts through the whole auditorium, you pause a moment to listen.

I LOVE YOU, YOU LOVE ME

1121111.title: What was that about the Quick and the Dead?

11211111.content: You only mean to close your eyes for a minute. However, you can't help but pass out. After a few minutes you start to feel a tingling sensation that causes you to wake up. You look around and see that you are in a dark slimey chamber filled with a strange liquid. With horror you realize what happened. While you were passed out the barney rex looking thing swallowed you whole, and now you're in its stomach being digested. You scream and began to struggle as the digestive jucies start to burn more. However, you start to start to pass out again before to long. The last thought on your mind before everything went black again was how you wished the barney rex looking thing would have chewed you instead of swallowing you alive.

The long inward curve teeth are yellowed in color and various parts of dinner are wedged between them, looking up you see the upper pallet is dripping saliva, and the lower jaw is filled with it up to your ankles. you are straddling the powerful tongue

Roll Back to the throat

Suddenly the tongue rears back, as if swallowing do you

choices: Hug the Toe and Try to ride it out
Leap from the toe and Try to run behind the rex for an escape
112111212.content: You back up quickly, Suddenly you back into something hard and scaly, you look up to see the upperbody of the Rex, apparently not noticing you, you stop for a moment and feel the foot lift up behind you, carrying you on it's toes, you are about to scream when the foot comes down on a child, smushing it messily and silencing the scream in your mouth, sitting on the foot you try to think a way out of this mess, the loud breathing of the rex disturbs your thoughts, it's far to close. do you
112111212.title: Big Foot

choices: cling to the gums in hopes that when the rex opens its jaws you can jump out
Wrestle with the tongue and try to make the Rex spit you out
1121112121.content: Hugging the Toe, holding on for dear life as it lifts and stomps the ground, the horrible crunch of bones follows each step, scores must be caught under rubble, just waiting to be steped on and put out of their misery, You get a close up view as each meal for the Rex is Scarfed up in two motions, the snag and the flip back into the throat. A peek up lets you see a quivering belly seemingly as large as the rest of the rex's body. Every tremor step causes you to clench tighter, but your grip is starting to fail, blood is now on the toes, making it hard to keep a grip, still the Rex hasn't noticed you. For a few minutes you cling on, then you are inverted, the Rex has stoped and kicked up his foot as he himself laid down on his back against the wall. The Rex's eyes look at you clining to his toe. Yes.. He certainly knows your there now, you don't look a bit like his toe. You Scream as he Stretches his rear leg and head to meet, those huge jaws open and you are thrust in. despertly you still hug the toe, her wouldn't bite off his foot, the jaws come down genlty ant the powerfull leg is pulled out slowly,scraping along the teeth. "So thats how the monster", you think before you are pressed against the sharp inside of the front teeth, easily pried off the tooth and into the mouth with a long red wound on you spine, a burning wound as the mouths juices splash everywhere. the Mouth is broiling hot, it feels like a jungle, the long powerful tongue rises up to see you, just like an annaconda you think as you kick it with your foot, The Rex might have you in it's mouth but your not going easy. The rest of the mouth is a dismal situation, a few body parts are wedged in the tarnished teeth, all the teeth seem to be made for keeping food in. and of course your sloshing around in lots of saliva. , do you

choices: Let go of the tongue and hope for a better opportunity
Try to slide under the tongue to wedge yourself in a safer
11211121211.content: You dig your fingers into the rex’s gums, hoping to somehow keep the ineveitable from happeing, your screams as a few fingernails break off your left hand, you find that cliniging to the wet hard surface of the gums is not going to be working. You quickly slide down deeper into the jaws as you feel them tilt up. A wave of salive slams you in the face, you momentarily blink, stretching out as best you can and grasping something wet and strong, you open your eyes to see the savior, the side of the tongue, it slowly lifts up, you still cling, it rubs you against the side of the jaw hard, you hold on for dear life. You feel a crack in your back, grimicing as the pain shoots up to your head, the beast is rubbing you against it’s cheek, pushing you up and back, closer to the hot air coming up from behind you. You manage a scream , but still remain clutching the side of the tongue.

choices: Waking up in a Scally suit
1121112122.content: You run off behind the Rex, Agilely leapfrogging the tail as it sweeps against you. You quickly Begin zig zaging, chancing a look back you are almost offended. The rex isn't even looking at you, it's got it's huge snout rummaging about in a pile of debree. A few seconds later the Rex lifts a chair in it's teeth, and hurls it at you, you scream and duck just in time, looking again you see the rex smiling at you then taking another chair of the ground and flinging it at you, clatters to your left. The rex might not be a good pitcher but he throws hard, the next chair gives you a glancing blow on your forhead, knocking you to the ground on your bum, you feel woozy and begin to slip into unconsciousness, as you struggle to keep your eyes open. You see that smiling Rex slowly stomp toward you bobbing it's head slowly as your eyes close. Just listening to the sounds as the steps get closer and closer

At least you won't see it coming if you manage to keep your eyes looking straight, the belly covering your upward vision and looking through the legs at the tail lolling about on the ground. Every breath jingles the belly above you. The Rex seems to be waiting, seeing what move you will make after it has gotten as close as it can without smushing you. you feel a drop of saliva on your back, it quickly wets through your clothing and makes your skin feel damp. Though you look like a statue on the outside you doubt you'll be able to control your panicking emotions in check much longer, especially when the rex seems so personally interested in you. what do you do?

11211122111.content: You shiver a little as the rex continues to smile at you bringing it's head down to gently tap yours, you somehow manage to remain motionless. The Rex's huge belly wobbles over you as the head goes back up. You could swear that the beast was amused. The huge beast stretches It's body over you, apparently trying to get you moving. Something deep inside tells you that this is not the best sign. But You could almost be Relieved as the huge Rex steps over you, letting it's tail gently move over your face, the tail suddenly twists your head,straining your body, you turn to avoid getting your neck snapped, looking right up at the rex colossal posterior mooning you. You Gulp as you watch those huge legs stretch out, lifting the huge bum above you, slowly it moves back, your eyes follow it as the Rex's rear hovers above you. You are terrified, you can't move even if you wanted too. You shiver, you know this. That Rex could see you all along. You watch as the butt sinks above you. The rex has decided to crush you most vilely, you wish you chose another path than staying put you look up, you can hardly see anything but the rex's rear, the tail slips between your legs and lifts you.almost as if to let you kiss the rump a moment before you are entombed in the flab. You feel the hot weight of the rexian rear press down on the back of your head, pushing you toward the ground, the tail brace slithers out and gives you the first feeling of the full weight of the rex, you know he must be sitting slowly and lightly, to get the most out of his "Toy" You feel your body press through the Rex’s butt, sitting on you perfectly to let you suffer as the slow squeezing of your body continues, your breathing shallows, then you feel snaping bones and body parts as the rear end clutches you tight, as the rex stands up, mercifully ending your suffering in the Rex’s rear.(the End)

1121112211212.content: Nervous from the sudden movement, you are awaken from your pleasure and start to inch back from the tongue. Suddenly, you realize you're inching towards the throat...too late. You begin to slide down the tongue like a slide, leading to the gaping throat. You're put in even more pleasure at the quick moving slide inbetween your legs, but you quickly grab at the pallate and grasp it tightly. The tongue slides down from under you, leaving you hanging inches from the gullet. Deep gurgles echoe through the narrow, hungry tube as you stare into its darkness. All of a sudden, the tongue powerfully whips you from the top of its mouth and you fall, landing on the tongue between the legs again. Quickly, you manage to roll forward off the tongue...only too have it pin your helpless body to the floor. When will it get tired of your taste? As if answering your question, the tongue wraps itself around your waist and lifts you up, tossing you to the back of the throat and catching you just in time. Then, it lets you drop down into the gullet. The throat walls close in around you. You squirm, struggling to get free. Finally, a long wet gulping sounds all around your terrified self as the gullet closes around your chest, shoulders, neck, then face. Ever so slowly, it pushes you down. You're quite confused, wondering why the hungry rex isn't swallowing you down quickly and hungrily...The gullet's wavy motions pull you down. You look up to see the sides waving in powerful motions. The last thing you see before it disappears into darkness is the flapping uvula and the tongue, licking at its throat, searching for more of your delicious taste. The throat muscles caress your struggling body and gently moves you all the way down. You slowly slide down the rest of the smooth, rippled throat, terrified beyond belief. You still can't accept it...you've been swallowed whole and alive! You soon plop down into the stomach where you...

1121112212222.content:
"Please! Someone help me please!" You start begging for help, but know it is a forlorn hope. Afterall, you wouldn't save someone from a rexes jaws if you were lucky enough not to be in them. The large and hungry rex keeps licking you with his slimy but powerful tongue, trying to get you loose so he can swallow you. You can hear some stomach gurgling from his dark throat as you struggle to hold onto your slimy handhold.
"Please let me out! Please don't eat me! I will do anything you want but please don't eat me!" He doesn't respond and just keeps licking at you, pushing with his powerful tongue to try and make you slip off like so many before you. After a few more moments of trying desperatly to hold on you feel yourself slip, then finally come free as his tongue skillfully flips you ontop of it, unfortunatly you are laying on your back facing his black abyss of a throat. "Please don't eat me! Please I will do anything! Please!"
Suddenly you are suprised when his tongue stops moving you closer to his throat when you are extremely close to it. You sigh, thinking that he has decided to spare you, and perhaps use you for other purposes. This hope is quickly dashed when he lets a long, wet belch roll out of his throat and give you a good wiff of the horrible stench of his rotting belly. You start to scream and plead again, but you don't get the chance to say much before he gives a mighty gulp and sends you into his gullet. You feel his powerful, warm and slimy throat grip you and start to send you to his belly. After a few short moments of his powerful throat griping you, you feel yourself slide out his tube of a throat and enter the hot, horrible smelling sauna of a belly.

11211221121.content: While you're unconscious you have a weird dream. You dream that laying on an undulating surface and then you dream that you're sliding down a slimey water slide. Suddenly, you are awoken by a tingling sensation. You look around and see that you are in a dark slimey chamber filled with a mysterious liquid. With horror you realize your dream wasn't a dream. The Rex ate you while you were unconscious. He didn't even bother to chew you; he just swallowed you alive. Suddenly, you notice that the digestive jucies are starting to burn more. You scream in a combination of pain and terror, and begin to struggle in vain. You soon begin to lose consciousness. As you close your eyes for the last time you think about how being swallowed alive was actually the slowest and most painful way to die.

You open your eyes, very slowly, fearful of the deadly tyrant stomping his way towards you.

You begin to notice a foul smell coming from near you, and, considering how regular you are, you know that it's not you.

Opening an eye fully, you see that your very much alive. A shadow arcs over you; an ominous-looking parabola that threatens your life.

One of the dinosaur's claws.

You're freaked! What shall you do?

You gulp and scream, trying to back away, but your head ends up starting to slide into the moist hole while the big rex moans deeply, sitting down on you more. You cringe as you slip further into the moist hole, feeling your clothes get torn off as you slip. The big beast then gets up, letting out a rank fart as it sighs in content. But before you could, you felt something pull you against the slimy walls, holding you in place! "Your going to spend eternity in my ass now human!"

So you ended up being a part of this dino's ass as you breathed in his farts while having to deal with him relieving himself of digested humans and kids! Eventually, your mind snaps and you eventually give in to this scaly beast as more of your trapped form is covered in his filth...

131.content:
You whisper, ever so slightly to the frail child to your right. "Please help me. I'd very much like to see Barney. Can you help me?"
And, as a dutiful child would, he got four or five of his buddies to come to your rescue.They cut you free using the essential plastic knives that their Happy Meals have come equipped with. "You like Barney, too?" a small voice asked as I surveyed the surroundings. "Yeah, kid. I like Barney." I pulled the gray tape from my arms, making sure not to pull too fast.
"Boys and Girls, I love to be with my friends." a voice droned on and echoed throughout the halls. The children were entranced. Mesmerized even.
"Hey, kid?" I asked. But, it was no use. He was gone. Lost to the underworld that is children's television. "I will see you again!" I shouted at his incoherent body, "Stay alive, no matter what occurs!" and I ran. I ran like an inmate on a furlough.
131.title: Run Like the Wind
